title:
Antenna Model for Safe Human Exposure in Future 6G Smartphones: A
  Network Perspective
authors: Haneet Kour, Rakesh Kumar Jha, Sanjeev Jain
abstract:
In this article we present the biological effect of antenna topology on a
users body. At different values of exposed frequency, the absorbent nature
varies in human body. One of the major factors to be taken into consideration
for designing 6G mobile antenna is the biological effect and Electromagnetic
Field Exposure (EMF).
subjects: Computing Research Repository/Networking and Internet Architecture
Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Signal Processing
